io.getstream.client.repo

Interface StreamRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StreamRepositoryImpl, StreamRepositoryImpl

    public interface StreamRepository
    Provide low-level access to the GetStream.io REST API.

    • Method Summary

      • deleteActivityById

        void deleteActivityById(BaseFeed feed,
                      String activityId)
                        throws IOException,
                               StreamClientException
        Delete activity by activity id.
        Parameters:
        feed - Feed that contains the activity to be deleted.
        activityId - Activity-id to be deleted.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception

        Parameters:
        feed - Feed that contains the activity to be deleted.
        foreignId - foreignId to be deleted.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exceptions

        String getReadOnlyToken(BaseFeed feed)
        Generate a JWT token to perform readonly operations.
        Parameters:
        feed - Input feed
        Returns:
        JWT token

      • follow

        void follow(BaseFeed feed,
          String targetFeedId,
          int activityCopyLimit)
            throws StreamClientException,
                   IOException
        Follow a feed.
        Parameters:
        feed - Feed that wants to follow a target feed.
        targetFeedId - Feed to follow.
        activityCopyLimit - How many activities should be copied from the target feed
        Throws:
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions

      • followMany

        void followMany(BaseFeed feed,
              FollowMany followManyInput,
              int activityCopyLimit)
                throws StreamClientException,
                       IOException
        Follow many feed in one shot.
        Parameters:
        feed - Feed that wants to follow a target feed.
        followManyInput - A FollowMany object which contains a list of sources and targets
        activityCopyLimit - Number of activities to copy from a source feed to the destination feed
        Throws:
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions

      • unfollow

        void unfollow(BaseFeed feed,
            String targetFeedId,
            boolean keepHistory)
              throws StreamClientException,
                     IOException
        Unfollow a feed.
        Parameters:
        feed - Source feed
        targetFeedId - Feed to unfollow.
        keepHistory - Whether the activities from the unfollowed feed should be removed
        Throws:
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions

      • getFollowing

        List<FeedFollow> getFollowing(BaseFeed feed,
                            FeedFilter filter)
                              throws StreamClientException,
                                     IOException
        List the feeds which the given feed is following.
        Parameters:
        feed - Source feed
        filter - Filter out the following list. Limited to 25 items by default.
        Returns:
        List of following
        Throws:
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions

      • getFollowers

        List<FeedFollow> getFollowers(BaseFeed feed,
                            FeedFilter filter)
                              throws StreamClientException,
                                     IOException
        Lists the followers for the given feed.
        Parameters:
        feed - Source feed
        filter - Filter out the followers list. Limited to 25 items by default.
        Returns:
        List of followers
        Throws:
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions

      • getActivities

        <T extends BaseActivity> StreamResponse<T> getActivities(BaseFeed feed,
                                                       Class<T> type,
                                                       FeedFilter filter)
                                                     throws IOException,
                                                            StreamClientException
        Lists the activities in the given feed.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Subtype of BaseActivity representing the activity type to handle.
        Parameters:
        feed - Feed which the activities belong to
        type - Type of the activity. Must be a subtype of BaseActivity
        filter - Filter out the activities. Limited to 25 items by default.
        Returns:
        List of activities
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception

      • addActivity

        <T extends BaseActivity> T addActivity(BaseFeed feed,
                                     T activity)
                                   throws StreamClientException,
                                          IOException
        Add a new activity to the given feed.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Subtype of BaseActivity representing the activity type to handle.
        Parameters:
        feed - Feed which the activities belong to
        activity - Activity to add.
        Returns:
        Activity as returned by the Stream server
        Throws:
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions

      • addActivities

        <T extends BaseActivity> StreamActivitiesResponse<T> addActivities(BaseFeed feed,
                                                                 Class<T> type,
                                                                 List<T> activities)
                                                               throws StreamClientException,
                                                                      IOException
        Add a new list of activities to the given feed.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Subtype of BaseActivity representing the activity type to handle.
        Parameters:
        feed - Feed which the activities belong to
        type - Type of the activity. Must be a subtype of BaseActivity
        activities - List of activities to add @return Activity as returned by the Stream server
        Returns:
        List of just sent activities
        Throws:
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions

      • updateActivities

        <T extends BaseActivity> StreamActivitiesResponse<T> updateActivities(BaseFeed feed,
                                                                    Class<T> type,
                                                                    List<T> activities)
                                                                  throws IOException,
                                                                         StreamClientException
        Update activities (foreignId and time are mandatory fields). Please refer to GetStream.io/docs for more info.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Subtype of BaseActivity representing the activity type to handle.
        Parameters:
        feed - Feed which the activities belong to
        type - Type of the activity. Must be a subtype of BaseActivity
        activities - List of activities to update @return Operation response
        Returns:
        List of just sent activities
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception

      • addActivityToMany

        <T extends BaseActivity> T addActivityToMany(List<String> targetIds,
                                           T activity)
                                         throws StreamClientException,
                                                IOException
        Add a new activity of type T to multiple feeds.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Subtype of BaseActivity representing the activity type to handle.
        Parameters:
        targetIds - Destination feeds. A target id is defined as $feedSlug:$feedId.
        activity - Activity to add.
        Returns:
        Response activity of type T coming from the server.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception

      • getAggregatedActivities

        <T extends BaseActivity> StreamResponse<AggregatedActivity<T>> getAggregatedActivities(BaseFeed feed,
                                                                                     Class<T> type,
                                                                                     FeedFilter filter)
                                                                                   throws IOException,
                                                                                          StreamClientException
        List aggregated activities.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Subtype of BaseActivity representing the activity type to handle.
        Parameters:
        feed - Feed which the activities belong to
        type - Type of the activity. Must be a subtype of BaseActivity
        filter - Filter out the activities. Limited to 25 items by default.
        Returns:
        List of aggregated activities
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception

      • getNotificationActivities

        <T extends BaseActivity> StreamResponse<NotificationActivity<T>> getNotificationActivities(BaseFeed feed,
                                                                                         Class<T> type,
                                                                                         FeedFilter filter)
                                                                                       throws IOException,
                                                                                              StreamClientException
        List notification activities.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Subtype of BaseActivity representing the activity type to handle.
        Parameters:
        feed - Feed which the activities belong to
        type - Type of the activity. Must be a subtype of BaseActivity
        filter - Filter out the activities.
        Returns:
        List of notification activities
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception

      • getNotificationActivities

        <T extends BaseActivity> StreamResponse<NotificationActivity<T>> getNotificationActivities(BaseFeed feed,
                                                                                         Class<T> type,
                                                                                         FeedFilter filter,
                                                                                         boolean markAsRead,
                                                                                         boolean markAsSeen)
                                                                                       throws IOException,
                                                                                              StreamClientException
        List notifications marking the activities as read and/or as seen.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Subtype of BaseActivity representing the activity type to handle.
        Parameters:
        feed - Feed which the activities belong to
        type - Type of the activity. Must be a subtype of BaseActivity
        filter - Filter the activities.
        markAsRead - Mark all the activities as read.
        markAsSeen - Mark all the activities as seen.
        Returns:
        List of notification activities
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception

      • getNotificationActivities

        <T extends BaseActivity> StreamResponse<NotificationActivity<T>> getNotificationActivities(BaseFeed feed,
                                                                                         Class<T> type,
                                                                                         FeedFilter filter,
                                                                                         MarkedActivity markAsRead,
                                                                                         MarkedActivity markAsSeen)
                                                                                       throws IOException,
                                                                                              StreamClientException
        List notifications marking some of them as read and/or as seen. An immutable list of activities to be marked as read and/or as seen can be built using the MarkedActivity builder.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Subtype of BaseActivity representing the activity type to handle.
        Parameters:
        feed - Feed which the activities belong to
        type - Type of the activity. Must be a subtype of BaseActivity
        filter - Filter the activities.
        markAsRead - List of activities to be marked as read.
        markAsSeen - List of activities to be marked as seen.
        Returns:
        List of notification activities
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception

      • getToken

        String getToken(BaseFeed feed)
        Get the token for the given feed.
        Parameters:
        feed - Feed
        Returns:
        A token string

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
              throws IOException
        Send the shutdown signal to the client.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
